price: (20) [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],
arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: dhī quwwatin ʿinda dhī al-ʿarshi makīnin
